app.name: Catalyst
app.author: cardosomartin33@gmail.com
app.description: Catalyst is a comprehensive toolkit that integrates various software solutions such as ApiStream, Base64 converters, image converters, canvas tools, and more. Our goal is to provide a centralized platform for tools that streamline workflows and enhance productivity. We are constantly expanding our features to meet the evolving needs of our users.

apistream.name: ApiStream
apistream.author: cardosomartin33@gmail.com
apistream.description: ApiStream is a powerful and versatile API testing tool that allows you to create, run, and manage API tests. It provides a user-friendly interface for creating and managing API requests, responses, and assertions. With ApiStream, you can easily test your APIs and ensure their functionality.
